data.name: Black And Green Roblox
ngb.to - Darkfish Alternate
Duolingo simplfied
data.description:
A clean, streamlined layout for Duolingo that reduces visual clutter and premium-upgrade notices. 

- Updated 2/18/2020 (Support changes to main skill trees area)
- Updated 3/11/2020 (Removed some of the new popup characters that appear during lessons, and mis-lesson popups)
- Updated 3/17/2020 (Removed more lesson tree popups, fixed practice button that had moved back to the bottom of the lesson tree.)
- Updated 4/30/2020 (Support changes to main skill trees area, hide more ads)
- Updated 7/6/2020 (Fixes for main skill tree area clicking, hide other new popup graphics)

data.name: YouTube - Better Full Dark Theme 2019 (ARC)
data.description: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Installation guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Problem fix guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ★Restore old layout guide *CLICK* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ►Please use "Customize Settings" to select layout. Options with "⚠" are important to install theme properly. ►For new layout please enable dark theme in YT settings first, and select option ⚠2 to "ON". To have dark theme permanently even after clearing cookies, select ⚠2 to "OFF", but it may be bugged/glitchy for some browsers. Think about it! And don't blame. ►If you have any problem there guides above! ►Report bugs with screenshot and without rating please..
